reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful and appreciate its thick, decent material, making it a perfect wedding guest dress. The dress features an adjustable back strap, and while some it fits well, others mention it's not big chest friendly. Customers disagree on whether the dress is flattering, with some noting it's not see-through, while the sizing receives mixed feedback with reports of exceptionally large chest areas. Several customers report receiving dresses with broken zippers. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great wedding guest dress!
items.body: Got this dress last minute for a wedding and it was honestly a great find. I’m 5’6, 135lbs and got a size small - I am not busty at all so it was a little big in the chest but fortunately has an adjustable strap in the back so it won’t fall down. The scarf part is attached to the draping in the back and it just had the most beautiful silhouette. The satin-like material was much thicker/more durable than I expected, but it did take about an hour to iron out all the deep set creases from packaging/shipment. Do not let that deter you from buying this though, because it fit great overall and I got so many compliments! The only complaint I have was that the adjustable strap across the back was attached to the dress on the sides with a hard plastic piece that dug into my back a little, but all in all I still give it 5 stars for being much better than expected! Read more
items.author: Giovanni Cannizzaro

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality on a budget
items.body: True to size, gorgeous color, and high quality. I got so many compliments when I wore this dress. It was easy to get on and off without help, and I will definitely be wearing this dress to multiple events for years to come. A perfect dress for girlies like me on a budget but want a high quality look. Read more
items.author: Brooke Cloutier

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Big boob friendly lol
items.body: Pretty dress but will be returning. Gave 3 stars because it's a nice dress, but **A warning for bigger chested woman!** This dress will not fit you because of A) side zipper and B) the boob part is tiny and will NOT keep the ladies covered lol Read more
items.author: Alisha Gamez

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Annoyed bc it was for a formal
items.body: Dress came in good quality other than the fact the front has so many threads loose. It looks cheap from all the loose threads and scratched fabric. Other than that, dress is good quality and is a heavier good material. Read more
items.author: Lindsey Brocato

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: Beautiful dress. Would love if it was a little longer. I’m 5’3 and160lbs for reference and I bought Medium. Love the adjustable strap that tightens to secure the boobs. Doesn’t have any stretch. The zipper made it easy to get into. My hips are about 40 inches and bust 33inches, waist 30inches. I loved it overall Read more
items.author: Talia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Love the style of the dress! The material thickness is better than expected, thick enough. It's not see through and it's very comfortable just try to get the best size for you, I ordered a Small and it was falling a little from the top. I should've ordered X-Small, for reference I'm 113 lbs and 5′6″ this is the dress in color Purple. I would say great value for money. Would appreciate different lengths. Read more
items.author: Paulina

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: Love this dress! Perfect fit and great quality. Read more
items.author: Elena Sacco

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Chest is huge
items.body: This dress is beautiful. Size is horrid. I wear a size 4 all the time and the chest was massive. Get 2 sizes down and only buy if bigger chested. I’m usually a B cup. I wish this fit. Price is worth it if it fits. Read more
items.author: Cassandra

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Deep Green, Burgundy, Rose, Black, Champagne, Mocha, Sage, Light Blue, Olive, Lilac, Navy, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
